text: Lee Frederick (June 2, 1912 – June 6, 1993) also credited as Robert Peyton) was an American film actor active during the 1950s. He played the lead character of an intelligence officer in the 1951 espionage thriller Tokyo File 212 opposite Florence Marly. Critic Robert J. Lentz called his performance "solid". ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role ! Notes |- |1937|| S.O.S.
